look at how bad Dreamhost is

In the last 7 days, theaxelvault.com has been down for almost 4 hours.

I was paying for a 'private' server. There is just no excuse for that. Thankfully I am almost done moving all of my sites and all of my data onto more reliable servers. I am now using Rackspace, Heroku, and Namecheap for my DNS and hosting needs, and theaxelvault.com soon will be no more.

See you later Dreamhost! Maybe one day you will get your act together.

By Krister Axel on 04/01 2011 at 20_02 in Random
